Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires food service establishments disclose if they are operating out of another food service establishment's kitchen or in a location which is not operated exclusively as a kitchen for such establishment
Summary: Requires food service establishments disclose if they are operating out of another food service establishment's kitchen or in a location which is not operated exclusively as a kitchen for such establishment.
LawCode: Add ยง350-f-2, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring food service establishments disclose if they are operating out of another food service establishment's kitchen or in a location which is not operated exclusively as a kitchen for such food service establishment
